snippet.title: FEAR THEM - Welcome to the Farm
snippet.description:
Immersive psycho-horror online multiplayer - explore abandoned places and investigate paranormal entities that watch you from the darkness and seek your life. Sprawling maps, advanced XP and andvancement system, incredible AI.

In this video we give you a glimpse of the first of several maps you will visit in FEAR THEM. THE FARM offers a vast area, many hiding places, but also some unpleasant places where malicious creatures might be present.

FEAR THEM will be a game for fans of suspense and investigation of the supernatural. Players, viewers, but especially streamers will have a lot of fun with the special features.

#FearThem #DevBlog #IndieGames

Discord: https://discord.gg/fearthem
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FearThemGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fearthemgame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fearthemgame

Pre-Release Anmeldung: 
https://forms.gle/TCevBusogWMN3eJa8

Kontakt: 
hey@fearthem.de
